home.tagline: KOSA, The Association Dedicated to Sharing Korean Culture and Building Connections

connection.title: Connection
connection.description: KOSA is a place where you can connect with our members and leadership team, discover our past and ongoing activities, and stay informed about upcoming events.

embrace.title: Embrace
embrace.mantra:
Korean,
Korean-American,
and anyone who loves Korean culture
embrace.description: KOSA is a community uniting Korean, Korean-American students, exchange students and anyone with a passion for Korean culture. We deliver every participant an amazing experience about Korean culture.

hero.title: Meet the KOSA E-board members
hero.description: We love connecting with diverse people and will keep you updated with events and news through social media.

wonjungJin.name: WonJung Jin
wonjungJin.description: Wonjeong is dedicated to support KOSA members, organize impactful events, and ensure that KOSA continues to grow as a network for cultural sharing.

gibeomChoi.name: Gibeom Choi
gibeomChoi.description: Gibeom manages KOSA's website, ensuring seamless functionality, updates, and accessibility to keep members informed and engaged.

jiyunLee.name: JiYun Lee
jiyunLee.description: Jiyun manages communications, organizes meetings, and creates new events for people interested in Korean culture.

evelynGu.name: Evelyn Gu
evelynGu.description: Evelyn oversees KOSA's financial matters, ensuring responsible budgeting and resource allocation to support our events and initiatives.

dahyeLim.name: Dahye Lim
dahyeLim.description: Dahye organizes engaging events that celebrate Korean culture, fostering community and cultural exchange among KOSA members.

jonathanChow.name: Jonathan Chow
jonathanChow.description: Jonathan collaborates with Dahye to plan and execute events that highlight Korean culture and promote community engagement.

stevensCharles.name: Stevens Charles
stevensCharles.description: Stevens curates and manages KOSA's social media presence, sharing updates, events, and cultural content to engage our community.

hero.title: Contact the KOSA Team
